name: In re ESTATE of Benjamin F. RISHEL, Deceased. Appeal of John R. EVANS, Administrator, C.T.A.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Benjamin F. RISHEL, Deceased. Appeal of John R. EVANS, Administrator, C.T.A.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County is affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Wray G. Zelt, III, Washington, for appellant.
James C. McCreight, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 215
In re ESTATE of Benjamin F. RISHEL, Deceased. Appeal of John R. EVANS, Administrator, C.T.A.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 1, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Wray G. Zelt, III, Washington, for appellant.
James C. McCreight, Washington, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
